title: Print, "Cross Section of Maison de Campagne", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed:
On plate, upper center, in the image: Coupe, ét Profil sur la largeur du Batiment, du dessein du Sr. Cuvilliés premier Architecte de S.A.S.E. de Baviere; upper right: N; lower left: Inventé par F. de Cuvilliés; lower center: Se vend a Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacque a limage St. Benoit Avec Privilege du Roy. ét chez l'auteur.; lower right: Gravé par C.A. LEspillez/5

First state, before the addition of the privilege upper center: C.P.S.C.M.; see for the second state, cut out within the plate mark, I-81, acc.no.: 1931-94-574.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Cross Section of Maison de Campagne", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-71.
